name: Riddles Of Nebula
description:
Riddles of Nebula (RoN) is a 3D first-person puzzle game that features:

  • Object carrying & throwing
  • Movement boost for extended jumps
  • Spherical movement around multiple planets
  • 3D Puzzles that need to be solved
  • A lot more

Please note that the game is just a short demo of the things we wanted to implement and the story is not integrated into the game.

Story

Your spaceship is broken and you are stranded in space. Luckily there is a teleporter on the ship, that can teleport you to nearby planets. On these planets you have to solve all kinds of puzzles to acquire the materials for repairing your spaceship.
